The Other Taxpayers Alliance

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 28 August 2009. Tagged politics, tax, and uk.

The Other Taxpayers Alliance aims to counter the influence of The Taxpayers Alliance, that mysteriously-funded and very right-wing pressure group who claim to represent ‘ordinary taxpayers’, but are essentially a bunch of Thatcherite grandees with a big PR budget.
